土耳其投资者等待法院对主要反对党的判决
item.description: 周五，土耳其投资者正等待法院对主要反对党命运的另一项判决，这一案件可能再次加剧该国的政治紧张局势。【原文：Investors in Turkey are awaiting yet another court verdict on the fate of the main opposition party on Friday, in a case that could once again escalate political tensions in the country.】

item.title: Blackstone 投资 7.06 亿美元，获得印度联邦银行 10% 的股份
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 在向印度联邦银行注资约 7.06 亿美元后，将成为该银行的最大股东。【原文：Blackstone Inc. will become the largest shareholder in India’s Federal Bank after injecting about $706 million into the lender.】

item.title: 法拉奇提出罢免贝利，表明他将插手英国央行事务
item.description: 奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）暗示，如果他成为首相，他将撤换英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey），这表明如果他领导的改革英国赢得下届大选，这位民粹主义领导人将干涉央行的独立性。【原文：Nigel Farage suggested he would replace Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey if he became prime minister, in a signal the populist leader would interfere in the central bank’s independence if his Reform UK wins the next election.】

item.title: 了解美国对俄罗斯石油的最新制裁措施
item.description: 美国政府于 10 月 22 日制裁了俄罗斯最大的两家原油生产商，这震惊了能源市场。现在，所有人都在关注制裁将如何影响全球石油的供应和价格。【原文：The US government jolted energy markets when it sanctioned Russia’s two biggest crude oil producers on Oct. 22. All eyes are now on how the sanctions will affect the supply and price of petroleum across the world.】

item.title: 铁矿石面临的压力与日俱增 100 美元支撑看似岌岌可危
item.description: 由于需求前景不明，中国钢厂利润承压，铁矿石下滑。【原文：Iron ore slipped as Chinese steel mill profits come under pressure amid an uncertain outlook for demand.】

item.title: 报告称中国对食品配送公司的质量控制进行调查
item.description: 据《经济观察报》报道，中国国家市场监管总局走访了中国主要送餐平台的办公室，作为对其经营行为调查的一部分。【原文：China’s State Administration for Market Regulation has visited the offices of the country’s leading food-delivery platforms as part of an investigation into their practices, according to a report by the Economic Observer.】

item.title: 中国商务部长称中美可以找到解决方案
item.description: 中国商务部长对与美国的会谈持乐观态度，称北京和华盛顿可以在两国关键贸易谈判之前找到解决方案。【原文：China’s Commerce Minister struck an optimistic tone on talks with the US, saying Beijing and Washington can find solutions ahead of key trade negotiations between the two countries.】

item.title: 东京燃气签署协议，探索从阿拉斯加项目购买液化天然气
item.description: 在美国总统访问日本的前几天，东京燃气公司（Tokyo Gas Co.【原文：Tokyo Gas Co. has signed a preliminary agreement to explore buying liquefied natural gas from a long-stalled project in Alaska that has been championed by Donald Trump, days ahead of a visit by the US president to Japan.】

item.title: 民调显示欧洲央行未来两年将把利率维持在2%水平
item.description: 根据彭博社对经济学家的调查，欧洲央行将在 2027 年前把欧元区借贷成本维持在 2% 的水平。【原文：The European Central Bank will keep euro-zone borrowing costs at 2% through 2027, according to a Bloomberg survey of economists.】

item.title: 移动机构称，缺乏非洲方言的人工智能模型将阻碍其普及
item.description: 据移动行业组织 GSMA 称，非洲语言内容的匮乏正在推迟人工智能在非洲大陆的应用，同时也加剧了人们对该技术的缺乏。【原文：A dearth of African-language content is delaying the uptake of artificial intelligence on the continent, compounding a lack of access to the technology, according to mobile industry body GSMA.】

item.title: 阿布扎比银行为潜在风险转移交易奠定基础
item.description: 阿布扎比最大的两家商业银行正在考虑进军重大风险转移市场，因为整个阿拉伯联合酋长国的贷款机构都面临着更高的资本要求。【原文：Two of Abu Dhabi’s biggest commercial banks are weighing a foray into the market for significant risk transfers as lenders across the United Arab Emirates face higher capital requirements.】

item.title: 炼油厂遭袭燃油成本上升，俄罗斯降息成疑
item.description: 由于乌克兰对炼油厂的袭击和即将到来的增税引发了通胀风险，俄罗斯本周可能会停止或放缓降息周期。【原文：Russia may halt or slow its cycle of interest-rate cuts this week as Ukrainian attacks on refineries and a looming tax increase stoke inflation risks.】

item.title: 集团称越南 2025-26 年咖啡产量将增长 10
item.description: 一个行业组织周五表示，如果天气条件保持良好，预计 2025-26 年越南咖啡产量将比上年增加 10%。【原文：Vietnam’s coffee output in 2025-26 is expected to be 10% higher than the previous year if weather conditions remain favorable, an industry group said on Friday.】

item.title: 日本财务大臣发出可能出售更多日本国债的信号
item.description: 日本财务大臣片山聪树（Satsuki Katayama）表示，如果现有资源不足，可能有必要增发债务，为首相高市真奈即将推出的经济一揽子计划提供资金。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister Satsuki Katayama signaled that it may be necessary to issue additional debt to fund Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s upcoming economic package, if existing resources prove insufficient.】

item.title: 特朗普称终止与加拿大的所有贸易谈判
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将立即停止与加拿大的所有贸易谈判。【原文：US President Donald Trump said he would immediately halt all trade negotiations with Canada.】

item.title: 制裁之后，中国国有买家不再购买俄罗斯石油
item.description: 在美国将俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）和卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）列入黑名单后，包括中石化在内的中国国有企业取消了对俄罗斯原油的部分海运采购，这加剧了石油市场混乱的迹象。【原文：Chinese state-owned companies including Sinopec canceled some purchases of seaborne Russian crude after the US blacklisted Rosneft PJSC and Lukoil PJSC, adding to signs of disruption in the oil market.】

item.title: 印度 Nifty 50 指数接近峰值，俄罗斯石油流量将下降
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 澳大利亚稀土公司将于年底前选定美国工厂选址
item.description: 澳大利亚战略材料有限公司（Australian Strategic Materials Ltd.）的目标是在今年年底前为其计划中的美国稀土工厂选址，以利用唐纳德-特朗普总统在与中国的竞争日益激烈的情况下对该行业的支持。【原文：Australian Strategic Materials Ltd. aims to choose a location for its planned US rare earths plant by the end of this year, capitalizing on President Donald Trump’s backing for the sector amid growing rivalry with China.】

item.title: 日本高市有望加强通胀应对和国防
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下周访问日本之前，日本首相高市真奈将首次以首相身份向国会发表讲话，讲话的重点可能是解决生活费用紧张问题和加强国防。【原文：Japan’s Sanae Takaichi is set to address parliament for the first time as prime minister, in a speech that will likely prioritize tackling a cost-of-living crunch and bolstering defense ahead of a visit by US President Donald Trump next week.】

item.title: 韩元走软，韩国承诺在必要时采取行动
item.description: 韩元跌至六个月低点后，韩国承诺在必要时采取行动稳定市场。【原文：South Korea pledged to take action if needed to stabilize markets after the won declined to a six-month low.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告亚洲今年经济增长将降温，下一步将面临贸易风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织称，亚太地区仍然是世界上增长最快的地区，尽管关税提高和保护主义抬头可能会减少对其出口的需求，并最终拖累经济活动。【原文：The Asia-Pacific remains the fastest-growing region in the world, though higher tariffs and rising protectionism are likely to reduce demand for its exports and eventually weigh on activity, according to the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 汇丰恒生私有化，中资银行看到潜在上涨空间
item.description: 随着中国财报季的全面展开，汇丰控股公司和中国主要贷款机构可能会为该地区银行业带来更光明的前景。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc and major Chinese lenders could show a brighter outlook for the region’s banking sector, with earnings season in China coming into full swing.】

item.title: 中国股市因政策解读和习特会而攀升
item.description: 中国股市上扬，原因是关于国家五年计划的重要政治会议的结果以及中美领导人会晤的确认支持了市场情绪。【原文：Chinese stocks advanced as the readout from a pivotal political gathering on the nation’s five-year plan and confirmation of a meeting between US and Chinese leaders supported sentiment.】

item.title: 美团计划首次发行点心债券，销售额高达 14 亿美元
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，中国餐饮外卖公司美团正寻求在其首次发行的点心债券中融资 90 亿至 100 亿元人民币（12.6 亿至 14 亿美元），为这个日益火热的市场近期的发行浪潮再添一笔。【原文：Chinese food delivery company Meituan is looking to raise 9 billion to 10 billion yuan ($1.26 billion to $1.4 billion) in its maiden dim sum bond offering, according to people familiar with the matter, adding to a wave of recent issuance in the increasingly hot market.】

item.title: 星链（Starlink）在印度零售店开业前启动安全测试
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星链"（Starlink）正在印度开始安全测试，这是该公司准备在世界上人口最多的国家提供商业卫星宽带服务的最后障碍之一。【原文：Elon Musk’s Starlink is starting security tests in India, one of the final hurdles for the company as it prepares to provide commercial satellite broadband services in the world’s most populous country, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新加坡第四季度房价上涨，租金上涨
item.description: 新加坡私人住宅价格连续第四个季度上涨，新房需求强劲的迹象表明，这一繁荣景象很可能会持续下去。【原文：Singapore private home prices rose for a fourth straight quarter and signs of strong demand for new units suggest the boom is likely to persist.】

item.title: 印尼独角兽公司 Xendit 试图在拉美取得亚洲成功
item.description: 东南亚最大的数字支付公司之一 Xendit 正在向拉丁美洲扩张，试图在其他新兴市场复制其在本土地区取得的成功。【原文：Xendit, one of Southeast Asia’s largest digital payments companies, is expanding into Latin America as it seeks to replicate the success in its home region in other emerging markets — a test of whether its all-in-one payments infrastructure can find traction in a region still catching up in digital finance.】

item.title: 中国人民银行顾问称中国必须为经济做出 "重大贡献
item.description: 一位央行顾问表示，中国需要更大胆的支出计划来修补家庭和企业的财务状况，因为经济复苏的迹象掩盖了与美国的贸易战所造成的损害。【原文：China needs a bolder spending package to mend the finances of households and companies, according to a central bank adviser, as signs of resilience in the economy mask the damage wrought by the trade war with the US.】
